items.title: Destiny 2’s Steam Playercount Is Rapidly Approaching 15,000 Peaks
items.description: Destiny 2 is falling to new depths in the age of The Portal, and it's hard to see how things turn around now, and what the bottom actually is.

items.title: The Best Sega Genesis Art Book Is Finally Available To All
items.description: If only every console had a book that captured its beauty, heart, and soul like Sega Mega Drive/Genesis: Ultimate Works.

items.title: ‘One Battle After Another’ Sets A Rotten Tomatoes Critic Score Record
items.description: One Battle After Another hits theaters today, and it has just set a specific Rotten Tomatoes record thanks to its critic scores.
